Omitted Editorial Notes Codification The act of Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, 64 Stat. 967, as amended by acts Aug. 8, 1953, ch. 400, §§ 1, 2, 67 Stat. 522, 528; Aug. 2, 1954, ch. 649, title VIII, § 808(a), 68 Stat. 645; Aug. 31, 1954, ch. 1149, §§ 1–7, 68 Stat. 1005, 1006; Aug. 12, 1955, ch. 868, §§ 4–7, 69 Stat. 713–715; Aug. 1, 1956, ch. 852, § 11, 70 Stat. 909; Aug. 3, 1956, ch. 915, title I, §§ 101–109, 70 Stat. 968, 969; Aug. 21, 1957, Pub. L. 85–161, 71 Stat. 403; Sept. 2, 1957, Pub. L. 85–267, §§ 1–8, 71 Stat. 593, 594; Aug. 28, 1958, Pub. L. 85–791, § 32, 72 Stat. 951, formerly classified to this chapter, was completely amended and renumbered by Pub. L. 85–620, Aug. 12, 1958, 72 Stat. 548, and reclassified to chapter 19 (§ 631 et seq.) of this title, and was subsequently repealed by Pub. L. 103–382, title III, § 331(a), Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3965. Sections 251 to 255 comprised subchapter I of this chapter. Section 251, act Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title I, § 101, 64 Stat. 967, authorized appropriations with conditions for use of funds. Section 252, act Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title I, § 102, 64 Stat. 968, provided for State applications for funds. Section 253, act Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title I, § 103, 64 Stat. 968, provided for allotments and payments to States. Section 254, act Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title I, § 104, 64 Stat. 968, provided for withholding of certification under certain circumstances and subject to judicial review. Section 255, acts Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title I, § 105, 64 Stat. 969; Aug. 8, 1953, ch. 400, § 2(m), 67 Stat. 529, related to delegation of functions and payment of expenses. Sections 271 to 280 comprised subchapter II of this chapter. Section 271, act Sept. 23, 1950, ch. 995, title II, § 201, 64 Stat. 969, contained declaration of policy for school construction in federally-affected areas.
